Class EventList

java.lang.Object
MVC.simu.framework.EventList
public class EventList extends Object
Maintains a prioritized list of future simulation events.

The EventList stores Event objects in chronological order, ensuring that the next event to be processed always has the smallest time value. It acts as the central scheduling mechanism for the simulation engine.

Responsibilities:

  • Stores events in a time-ordered queue
  • Provides access to the next event time
  • Supports adding, removing, and checking for remaining events

Typically used by Engine and other components to schedule and retrieve events during simulation execution.

    • remove

      public Event remove()
      Removes and returns the next event (the one with the smallest time).
      Returns:
      the next scheduled Event
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the list is empty

      Parameters:

    • getNextTime

      public double getNextTime()
      Returns the time of the next scheduled event without removing it.
      Returns:
      the time of the next event

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the event list is empty.
      Returns:
      true if no events remain, false otherwise
